sentences: Kütt veel korra, – lahkume, / pöörge, sõbrad, tagasi..
context: The word 'lahkume' is the 1st person plural present tense form of the verb 'lahkuma' in Estonian. It means 'we leave,' 'we part,' or 'we depart.' The word appears to be related to or interchangeable with 'pöörama' (to turn/rein) based on the example provided, suggesting it might have a dual meaning in this context - both leaving physically and turning back or away. This is commonly used when saying goodbye to a group of people.
